name: Bike
description:
Traveling over the Atlantic on my bike.

[3508*4600]px.

I get on the bike and my mind clears, everything is fine. I just think that it is the most beautiful means of locomotion that we invented. The effort-benefit ratio is so great that I can't find a comparable one. 

I created this work when I spent my first 14 days isolated in quarantine. 30 days after the health emergency was declared in Argentina. I missed riding my bike so much that I needed to dedicate something special to it at the time.
The maritime environment arises from the inability and desire to cross the Atlantic due to the world situation. I went to visit my family in Argentina and could not return to Barcelona, where I was living.

Enjoy the ride!
